name: project-structure-creator
description: A project structure generator for React and Next.js applications

scripts.clean-check: git diff-index --quiet HEAD || (echo 'Git working directory not clean.' && exit 1)
scripts.publish:patch: npm run clean-check && npm version patch && npm publish
scripts.publish:minor: npm run clean-check && npm version minor && npm publish
scripts.publish:major: npm run clean-check && npm version major && npm publish

author: Meet5555
